column5: a special task force cracked down on a Chinese run counterfeit cigarette production and smuggling site in Phnom Sruoch district
column7: 000 pens of cigarettes and two machines. The crackdown on Chinese counterfeit cigarettes in Phnom Sruoch district has so far been a force of cooperation with the prosecution
column8: and the committee is investigating and investigating the case in the near future.------Machines and material for producing counterfeit 555 brand cigarettes were seized.------A total of 7 Chinese and 21 Cambodian workers
column9: including 3 women were taken to Kompong Speu Provincial Police Office in order to establish a case file for the provincial court. ------AREY
